Objects of the \mbox{\hyperlink{class_open_x_l_s_x_1_1_x_l_xml_data}{XLXml\+Data}} type are intended to be stored centrally in an \mbox{\hyperlink{class_open_x_l_s_x_1_1_x_l_document}{XLDocument}} object, from where they can be retrieved by other objects that encapsulates the behaviour of Excel elements, such as \mbox{\hyperlink{class_open_x_l_s_x_1_1_x_l_workbook}{XLWorkbook}} and \mbox{\hyperlink{class_open_x_l_s_x_1_1_x_l_worksheet}{XLWorksheet}} }{\pageref{class_open_x_l_s_x_1_1_x_l_xml_data}}{}
